issue.title: [Docs] Update the gen_apidocs docker script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2613](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2613). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `dev/gen_apidocs.sh` docker-based script is a bit out-of-date compared to the build process we currently have.

Additionally, at the moment it always does a new clean build of the C++, GLib and Cython binaries and this docs generation takes quite long.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2613?focusedCommentId=16482877) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 2068
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/2068>
